Why Free Methods Fail

Free guides from 2018 use images that are reverse-searchable. Scripts that targets have seen 100 times. Platforms that have patched those exploits. They work for the person who wrote them... once. Then everyone copies it and it burns.

Our Protocol is updated monthly. Methods that worked last week still work this week. That's the difference between free garbage and operational intelligence.
